content.p: PSCBM aims to improve your presentation skills for business competitions and meetings. You will be trained with the relevant presentation and communication tools in seminars, an interactive workshop and consultation session. Upon mastering those skills and tools, you will have the opportunity to apply them in a mock competition. Finally, you are required to write a reflection journal based on pre- and post-module skills audit to consolidate and share your experience through the journey of PSCBM. So do not miss this opportunity to master a skill you need for a lifetime! Register yourself and be committed to gain the best out of PSCBM. To apply for this module, click here. By registering to accredit this module you are agreeing to the Terms and Conditions. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
